title: Becoming Mrs. Zendahl
description: Laurel Zendahl, a 33 year old wife and mother, finds herself on a trembling journey questioning possibility. Her dream in life was to go to college. After sixteen years, she fights feelings of resentment and guilt for not being able to come to terms with her plan b. A gaping hole exists on her soul, begging her to find a bigger purpose. Join Laurel as she discovers strength through confrontation. Witness her incredible path to acceptance, of herself and the ones she blames for her failures. When it's over, who will be left standing beside her? Will she find a purpose she can live with? Her internal battle is paved with tears and humor as she struggles to admit she is worthy.
author: Lara Song
